message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $85?
Bob, I understand you're on a budget. I'm willing to come down a bit to $95.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  Let's try $92.50.  That's a good midpoint between our last offers and we can both get what we want. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to go up to $92, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

Bob, I understand you're pushing your budget, but $92 is still a bit below what I can do.  Let's try $98. That's a fair price considering the quality of the product and its value to you.  I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement here.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid $98 is still too high for me. I'm willing to make one last offer: $88. If you can meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
